faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about buying and selling crypto with ArmBitcoin.
faqHowBuyAnswer: Simply contact us via Telegram with your wallet address and desired amount. Our team will guide you through the process and complete the transaction quickly.
faqFeesAnswer: We charge a competitive 2.5% fee on all transactions. The fee is included in the quoted price with no hidden charges.
faqTimeQuestion: How long does a transfer take?
faqTimeAnswer: Most transfers are processed within 30 minutes after confirmation via Telegram. Bitcoin network confirmation may take additional time.
faqMinAnswer: The minimum transaction amount is $50 USD equivalent. There is no maximum limit for verified users.
faqSafeAnswer: Yes. We use enterprise-grade security measures and all transactions are processed through verified channels via Telegram.
